Setup documentation
======================================


Requirements
---------------------

* `dropbox <http://www.dropbox.com/static/developers/dropbox-client-python-BETA.tar.gz>`_
* Python 2.6.6



  
Usage
---------------------

To run the application make a directory mnt and call: 

**python** *-m cloudfusion.pyfusebox.pyfusebox mnt* 

To unmount run the following in the same directory you ran the above command:

**fusermount** *-u mnt -z*
